title: America's Funniest Home Videos: Animal Edition
overview: America's Funniest Home Videos has been a household staple since its inception, providing hilarious entertainment from some of the most happy coincidences and epic fails in television history. But there's no question that animal videos featuring furry friends and scaly celebrities are the most entertaining yet. A spinoff of the ABC hit, America's Funniest Home Videos: Animal Edition presents knee-slapping, tear-jerking animal humor to Nat Geo WILD!
